item.title: Sonakshi Sinha slams Mukesh Khanna for his remarks on her father Shatrughan Sinha and her upbringing: 'Th - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha slams Mukesh Khanna for his remarks on her father Shatrughan Sinha and her upbringing: 'The next time you decide to comment on the values...'

Date: Latest News | Source: Times of India

Sonakshi Sinha has openly criticized actor Mukesh Khanna for negative comments he made regarding her father, Shatrughan Sinha, and her upbringing. She emphasized the importance of respecting family values and called for a respectful dialogue.

"The next time you decide to comment on the values, maybe take a look at your own."
  • Sonakshi firmly defends her father, highlighting his values and contributions.
  • The actress advocates for respectful discussions regarding public figures and their families.
  • Mukesh Khanna's statements are seen as controversial and inappropriate.

The incident has sparked discussions about familial respect in the entertainment industry and the role of public influencers in shaping dialogue.

item.title: 'True Genius': PM Modi Condoles Zakir Hussain's Death, Hails His Contribution to Global Music - News18
item.description:
PM Modi Condoles the Death of Tabla Maestro Zakir Hussain

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: News18

Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed his condolences following the passing of Ustad Zakir Hussain, a legendary tabla maestro who passed away at the age of 73 in San Francisco. PM Modi praised Hussain’s contributions to Indian classical music and cultural unity.

  • Hussain died from complications related to idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
  • Regarded as one of the greatest tabla players, he captivated millions globally.
  • PM Modi highlighted Hussain's role in blending Indian classical traditions with global music.
  • Hussain is survived by his wife and daughters.
Deeply saddened by the passing of the legendary tabla maestro, Ustad Zakir Hussain Ji. He will be remembered as a true genius who revolutionized the world of Indian classical music. — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) December 16, 2024

This loss is felt deeply within the music community and among music lovers around the world.

item.title: Nicole Kidman reveals her mother's ‘final words’ to her, ‘I didn't know…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nicole Kidman reveals her mother's advice changed her perspective on life

Date: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Nicole Kidman recently opened up about her mother's “final words” to her following the passing of her mother, Janelle Ann Kidman. She shared how those words significantly impacted her outlook on life during a CBS morning interview.

  • Kidman had received the news of her mother's death during the Venice Film Festival.
  • Her mother's last advice urged her to take care of herself, prompting Kidman to reflect on self-care for women.
  • As a mother of four, Kidman emphasizes the importance of self-care for the wellbeing of her children.
“The final words my mama said, which I didn’t know were gonna be the final words…”

Kidman is now committed to ensuring that both she and other women prioritize their well-being.

item.title: Chinmayi Sripada slams Kapil Sharma for ‘racist jibes’ at Atlee: 'Will they never stop these comments abo - TOI Etimes
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 12: Allu Arjun film remains stable on second Monday, crosses ₹900 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil-starrer has broken several records at the box office since its release.

Date: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2 The Rule has been unstoppable at the box office since its theatrical release on December 5, showing no signs of slowing down. As it approaches its second week, the film has crossed ₹900 crore at the box office, inching closer to becoming the highest-grossing Indian film.

  • Collected ₹27.75 crore on day 12, the lowest single-day collection for the film so far.
  • Generated ₹725.8 crore by the end of the first week in theatres.
  • Collected ₹63.3 crore on its second Saturday and ₹76.6 crore on Sunday.
  • Total India collection now stands at ₹929.85 crore.
  • Achieved an overall 24.11% Telugu occupancy and 21.26% Hindi occupancy on Monday.
“Pushpa 2 has already crossed the ₹1000-crore mark worldwide and is now among the top 10 highest-grossing Indian films ever.”

Pushpa 2: The Rule, directed by Sukumar, features Allu Arjun as the titular gangster Pushpa Raj, and stars Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.

item.title: In interim order, Supreme Court directs T.M. Krishna to be not recognised as recipient of M.S. Subbulakshmi award - The Hindu
item.description:
Supreme Court Directs T.M. Krishna Not to Claim M.S. Subbulakshmi Award

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

The Supreme Court has issued an interim order stating that Carnatic vocalist T.M. Krishna should not be recognized as a recipient of the M.S. Subbulakshmi Award. This ruling follows a petition claiming that Krishna's previous remarks about the late singer were insulting.

  • The court restrained Krishna from presenting himself as a recipient of the award.
  • The order came after Krishna was conferred the award by The Hindu and the Music Academy.
  • Justice Roy emphasized that the interim order is not a reflection on the Music Academy or The Hindu Group.
  • The petitioner argued that an individual who insulted the singer should not receive an award in her name.
“Somebody made bad comments about Bapu Mahatma Gandhi… will it not offend constitutional values to confer an award in his name to that person?” - N. Venkataraman

The court has allowed for amendments and replies in the ongoing case, which will be revisited in six weeks.

item.title: In interim order, SC directs T.M. Krishna to be not recognised as recipient of M.S. Subbulakshmi award - The Hindu
item.description:
Supreme Court Intervenes in T.M. Krishna's Award Recognition

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: The Hindu

The Supreme Court has ruled that Carnatic musician T.M. Krishna should not be recognized as the recipient of the M.S. Subbulakshmi Award following a petition challenging his acceptance of the honor.

  • The ruling was made in an interim order by Justices Hrishikesh Roy and S.V.N. Bhatti.
  • The petition was filed by V. Shrinivasan, a grandson of M.S. Subbulakshmi, claiming Mr. Krishna had made derogatory remarks about the late singer.
  • The court restrained Mr. Krishna from projecting himself as an award recipient until further notice.
  • The order came shortly after Mr. Krishna received the award at the Music Academy's annual event in Chennai.
  • Justice Roy emphasized that the interim order does not reflect poorly on the Music Academy or The Hindu, nor on Mr. Krishna's singing abilities.
“The court is mindful of the respect and honour M.S. Subbulakshmi commands over music lovers across all spectrums.”

Legal representatives for Mr. Krishna and the Music Academy denied the allegations, stating that the comments attributed to him were misinterpreted. The court has allowed the petitioner to amend his legal claim as necessary.

item.title: Salman Khan, Rashmika Mandanna's Sikandar Teaser To Drop On Superstar's 59th Birthday On Dec 27 - News18
item.description:
Salman Khan and Rashmika Mandanna's Sikandar Teaser Set for Release on December 27

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: News18

Fans of Salman Khan can look forward to a special treat as the teaser for his upcoming film Sikandar will be released on his 59th birthday, December 27, 2024. This has generated significant excitement among the audience.

  • The teaser release aligns with Salman Khan's birthday celebration, making it a double treat for fans.
  • Produced by Sajid Nadiadwala and directed by A.R. Murugadoss, Sikandar stars Salman Khan and Rashmika Mandanna.
  • The release marks the reunion of Salman Khan and Sajid Nadiadwala after their successful collaboration on Kick in 2014.
  • The anticipation around Sikandar is high, with plans for a theatrical release during the Eid weekend in 2025.
“Sikandar is among the most awaited films of 2025” - Source.

The release of the teaser is expected to kick off the film's marketing campaign, setting the stage for an exciting year ahead for Salman Khan fans.

item.title: Papon remembers Ustad Zakir Hussain: 'A personal and musical loss' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Papon mourns Ustad Zakir Hussain, calling his loss heartbreaking and a personal void, as they had planned a collaboration next year

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The world of music has been left reeling after the passing of tabla maestro Ustad Zakir Hussain, who succumbed to complications from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis at the age of 73. Zakir breathed his last in San Francisco, US on Monday, leaving behind an unparalleled legacy that transcended genres and borders.

  • Papon expressed deep grief over Zakir Hussain's passing, describing it as shocking and heartbreaking.
  • The Assam-born musician had planned a collaboration with Hussain next year.
  • Zakir Hussain was a virtuoso tabla player known for introducing Indian classical music to global audiences.
“This is truly shocking & heartbreaking! His playing was at its absolute peak! What a tremendous loss for the world of music and an incredibly personal loss for me,” Papon shared.
“For me, he was the perfect example of dignity and greatness, and it’s hard to believe he’s gone,” Papon added.

The legacy of Ustad Zakir Hussain lives on through his monumental contributions to the world of music and the countless individuals he inspired.

item.title: Sara Ali Khan's viral dance video with ex-boyfriend Veer Pahariya stuns the internet - TOI Etimes

item.title: Diljit slams trolls after being pulled up for wrong Punjab spelling - The Tribune India
item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh Responds to Trolls Over Punjab Spelling Controversy

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: The Tribune

Punjabi singer Diljit Dosanjh criticized trolls for misrepresenting him in a tweet concerning the spelling of Punjab.

  • Dosanjh condemned the online backlash for his spelling of Punjab as 'Panjab'.
  • He referred to the critics as 'vehley' or idle and expressed that omitting the Indian flag in tweets is a conspiracy.
  • He vowed to write 'PANJAB' in Punjabi going forward.
  • Currently on his Dil-Luminati India Tour, Dosanjh is set to perform in various cities until December 29.
“If Punjab is written as Panjab then that's a conspiracy.”

The singer continues to face scrutiny but remains steadfast in his identity and love for India.

item.title: Zakir Hussain, legendary Indian tabla musician, dies aged 73 - The Guardian
item.description:
Zakir Hussain, Legendary Indian Tabla Musician, Dies Aged 73

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Zakir Hussain, one of India’s most accomplished classical musicians who defied genres, has passed away at the age of 73.

  • He died from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis at a hospital in San Francisco on Sunday.
  • Hussain was known as one of the greatest tabla players of his generation, with a career spanning six decades.
  • His collaborations included notable artists like George Harrison and Yo-Yo Ma.
  • He formed the Indian jazz fusion band Shakti in 1973.
  • In 2024, Hussain won three Grammy awards in one year.
  • He received the Padma Vibhushan, India’s second-highest civilian award, in 2023.
“His prolific work as a teacher, mentor and educator has left an indelible mark on countless musicians.”

Zakir Hussain’s legacy as a cultural ambassador and musician will remain unparalleled.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection: Allu Arjun’s Film Crosses Rs 1300 Crore, Surpasses Yash Starrer KGF 2 - ABP Live
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection: Allu Arjun’s Film Crosses Rs 1300 Crore, Surpasses Yash Starrer KGF 2

Published at: 16 Dec 2024 06:57 PM (IST) Source: એબીપી લાઇવ

Allu Arjun's action-packed thriller ‘Pushpa 2: The Rule’ has made headlines by crossing Rs 1300 crore at the global box office within just 11 days of its release.

  • The film has earned Rs 1302.60 crore by the end of its second Monday.
  • It surpasses the lifetime collection of Yash’s ‘KGF Chapter 2’ which earned Rs 1215 crore.
  • Pushing the boundaries further, 'Pushpa 2' is on track to challenge 'RRR's' record of Rs 1309 crore.
  • The film has already outperformed Shah Rukh Khan's ‘Jawan’ in collections.
“The tragedy occurred on the night of December 4 at Sandhya Theatre in Hyderabad...”

In conclusion, ‘Pushpa 2’ has not only set a new benchmark in box office collections but has also solidified Allu Arjun's position as a leading superstar in the Indian film industry.

item.title: ‘Sonam 2.0, not Alia 2.0’: Ananya Panday trolled for saying people take her seriously after CTRL, Call Me Bae - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ananya Panday Faces Trolls After Claiming People Take Her Seriously

Publication Date: Dec 16, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Ananya Panday is under scrutiny after claiming in an interview that people are starting to take her seriously as an actor following her recent works, notably her web series Call Me Bae and the film CTRL.

  • Ananya believes that her performances in recent OTT releases have gained her credibility.
  • She portrays a hustler heiress in Call Me Bae and an influencer in CTRL.
  • Despite her confidence, she faces trolling on social media about her statement.
  • Some online comments mock her claims, calling her 'Sonam 2.0'.
  • However, she also received support from fans praising her performances in her recent projects.
“She is in her delusional era,” commented a user on social media.

The reaction to Ananya's statement showcases the mixed perceptions of her acting career and the ongoing debate about nepotism in Bollywood.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna slams Shatrughan Sinha for daughter Sonakshi Sinha's lack of knowledge regarding 'Ramayana' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Criticizes Shatrughan Sinha Over Daughter's Knowledge of Ramayana

Publication Date: October 23, 2023 Source: Times of India

Mukesh Khanna, a veteran actor, expressed his disappointment in Shatrughan Sinha for not educating his daughter, Sonakshi Sinha, about Ramayana, raising concerns about cultural education in today's generation.

  • Khanna called out Sinha for his daughter's lack of knowledge regarding Hindu mythology.
  • The remarks sparked discussions on the responsibilities of parents in passing down cultural values.
  • This incident highlights a broader debate on the importance of traditional knowledge in modern society.
“Why didn't they teach their children?” - Mukesh Khanna

This controversy emphasizes the perennial question of cultural education and the role of families in imparting such knowledge to their children.

item.title: TM Krishna Shall Not Be Recognized As Recipient Of Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi Award : Supreme... - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Supreme Court Rules Against TM Krishna's Recognition for Sangita Kalanidhi Award

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: LiveLaw

The Supreme Court has issued an interim order preventing Carnatic musician TM Krishna from being recognized as the recipient of the Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi award.

  • The interim order restrains Krishna from presenting himself as the award's recipient following its conferment on December 15, 2024.
  • This order stems from a petition filed by the grandson of MS Subbulakshmi.
  • The Court emphasized the respect associated with MS Subbulakshmi and asked Krishna to refrain from using her name in connection with the award.
  • Amidst arguments, it was asserted that TM Krishna made offensive remarks about Subbulakshmi that were incompatible with receiving an award in her name.
“As the award has been already awarded... we deem it appropriate to say that defendant no.4(TM Krishna) should not be recognised...”

Justice Bhatti noted the sensitive nature of the case, indicating that until the matter is resolved, Krishna cannot claim the award.

item.title: BREAKING |TM Krishna Shall Not Be Recognized As Recipient Of Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi Award :... - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Supreme Court Halts Recognition of TM Krishna for Sangita Kalanidhi Award

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: LiveLaw

The Supreme Court issued an interim order preventing Carnatic musician TM Krishna from being recognized as the recipient of the Sangita Kalanidhi MS Subbulakshmi award, following a petition from the awardee's descendants.

  • The Supreme Court's interim order came after a petition challenged the earlier decision by the Madras High Court to grant the award to TM Krishna.
  • The order stops Krishna from presenting himself as the award recipient.
  • The court emphasized respect for the legacy of MS Subbulakshmi and suggested that TM Krishna’s previous comments might not befit the honor associated with her name.
  • Amidst arguments, it was asserted that awarding the prize to Krishna would tarnish the reputation of the award and its historical significance.
Justice Bhatti stated, "Till we are clear, awardee cannot have the award in the name of person who he is stated to have disrespected."

This case highlights ongoing tensions around cultural representations and respect for artistic legacies.

item.title: Game Changer: Not One But Two Headaches - M9
item.description:
Game Changer: Not One But Two Headaches

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: M9 News

Ram Charan's upcoming film, Game Changer, set to release in four weeks, carries significant weight as it follows the success of RRR. The film faces intense scrutiny from rival fan groups ahead of its premiere.

  • Game Changer is Ram Charan's immediate film release after the blockbuster RRR.
  • Fans are comparing Charan's performance against Jr NTR's record with Devara, which grossed over Rs 400 crore.
  • Competing films Daaku Maharaj and Pushpa 2 are creating added pressure on Game Changer.
  • Social media rivalry between Nandamuri and Allu fan groups is expected to intensify during the film's launch.
If Shankar delivered a flawless product then all is well here, or else, things could get really ugly really quickly given the prevailing warring situation on social media.

The outcome of Game Changer will be closely watched, with a solid execution being crucial for its success amid the competitive landscape.

item.title: Katrina Kaif spotted seeking blessings at Shirdi Sai Baba Temple - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Katrina Kaif Spotted Seeking Blessings at Shirdi Sai Baba Temple

Publication Date: Not specified in the article

Source: Times of India

Katrina Kaif was recently spotted at the Mumbai airport before heading to Shirdi to offer prayers. She showcased her love for traditional attire with a stunning yellow ethnic suit and engaged fully in her prayers at the temple.

  • Katrina was seen in an elegant outfit featuring floral embroidery.
  • She was polite and cheerful while interacting with paparazzi, smiling and waving.
  • The actress celebrated her third wedding anniversary with Vicky Kaushal.
  • Katrina shared glimpses of their anniversary trip in Rajasthan.
  • Fans are eagerly awaiting news about her upcoming film 'Jee Le Zaraa'.
“48 hrs in the jungle,” Katrina shared on Instagram regarding her anniversary getaway.

The event highlights Katrina's connection with her cultural roots, as she seeks blessings at one of the most revered shrines in India.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' tops list of second weekend highest grossing movies with Rs 100 crore just in Hindi; followed by 'Stree 2', 'Gadar 2', 'Animal' and 'Baahubali 2' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' Breaks Box Office Records in Second Weekend Grossing Rs 100 Crore in Hindi

Publication Date: December 5, 2023
Source: Times of India

'Pushpa 2' is making headlines as it sets a new record at the box office, grossing Rs 100 crore in its second weekend from the Hindi version alone, amidst controversies surrounding its lead actor.

  • 'Pushpa 2' grossed Rs 63.3 crore on Saturday, showing a growth of around 73% from Friday.
  • On Sunday, it made Rs 76 crore, with Rs 54 crore coming from the Hindi version.
  • The film is projected to cross Rs 1000 crore net in India across all languages.
  • Other top contenders in the second weekend include 'Stree 2' with Rs 93 crore, 'Gadar 2' with Rs 89 crore, and 'Animal' with Rs 88 crore.
'Pushpa 2' now tops the list of the highest-grossing second weekend movies.

The success of 'Pushpa 2' highlights its popularity and the strong connection it has established with the audience.

item.title: "Write Panjab Or Punjab...": Diljit Dosanjh Reacts To Spelling Controversy - NDTV
item.description:
'Write Panjab Or Punjab...': Diljit Dosanjh Reacts To Spelling Controversy

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: NDTV

A social media post by Punjabi singer and actor Diljit Dosanjh has sparked a 'Punjab vs Panjab' debate after he shared a video captioned with 'Panjab', leading to allegations about his loyalty.

  • Diljit shared a video upon arriving at Chandigarh airport, using the term 'Panjab'.
  • Social media users suggested he was promoting a Pakistani identity by this spelling.
  • In response, Diljit called the accusations 'conspiracy theories'.
  • He emphasized that spelling differences do not affect Punjab's identity.
“If Punjab is written as Panjab, it's called a conspiracy... Whether you write it as Panjab or Punjab... it will always remain Punjab.” — DILJIT DOSANJH

The debate reflects deeper historical and cultural tensions between India and Pakistan regarding the Punjab region's identity.

item.title: Vivian Dsena's wife Nouran Aly reacts on calling Karan Veer Mehra 'junior artist': 'Mujhe farak..' - India Forums
item.description:
Nouran Aly Defends Vivian Dsena Against Karan Veer Mehra's Remarks on Bigg Boss 18

Published: Monday, June 15, 1446 at 8:42 AM | Source: India Forums

Nouran Aly, wife of television actor Vivian Dsena, made headlines after her recent appearance on Bigg Boss 18, where she addressed the controversy surrounding remarks made by Karan Veer Mehra.

  • Karan Veer Mehra allegedly called Vivian a "junior artist" and said he invited him to parties to fill space.
  • Nouran clarified her stance on social media, stating that her words were manipulated and emphasized her indifference to hate comments.
  • She stated, "Who called the other junior artist? Manipulating or twisting my statement won't work on me. Hate comments and fake narratives don't affect me—mujhe fark nahi padta."
  • Her bold defense has rallied support from fans, reinforcing Vivian's position in the show.

Fans are excitedly labeling this as Vivian's "comeback era" on the show, anticipating his potential victory in Bigg Boss 18.

item.title: Controversy after Ilaiyaraaja faces sanctum entry restrictions, temple cites protocol - The Indian Express
item.description:
Controversy after Ilaiyaraaja faces sanctum entry restrictions, temple cites protocol

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: The Indian Express

Renowned music composer Ilaiyaraaja's recent visit to the Srivilliputhur Andal Temple stirred controversy after he was denied access to the sanctum, with officials citing protocol.

  • Ilaiyaraaja was accompanied by prominent religious figures during his visit to the temple.
  • He paid his respects from outside the restricted areas, adhering to temple protocols that apply to all devotees.
  • Post-visit, he was honored with garlands and attended a cultural event celebrating the launch of his album 'Divya Pasuram'.
  • Videos circulated on social media suggesting a denial of entry led to public interpretations connected to his caste identity, sparking criticism.
  • Temple authorities maintained that the restrictions are standard and not based on caste factors.
“The temple administration gave him full honours.” - Sri Sadagopa Ramanuja Jeeyar Swamigal

Overall, the incident has raised questions about temple protocols and their application in sensitive situations, particularly concerning caste dynamics.

item.title: Fans exchange blows, launch cans at each other in VIP lounge of Karan Aujla's concert in Gurugram. Watch videos - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Violence Erupts at Karan Aujla's Concert in Gurugram

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Karan Aujla's concert on December 15 in Gurugram, attended by over 12,000 people, turned chaotic as fights broke out among attendees, casting a shadow over the event.

  • Concert attracted a large crowd with special appearances by rapper Badshah and actor Varun Dhawan.
  • Multiple videos show violent altercations among concertgoers, especially in the VIP lounge.
  • Backlash on social media regarding security arrangements at the venue.
  • Karan Aujla performed for two hours including hits like 'Tauba Tauba' and 'Making Memories'.
“Thank you Gurugram! Tonight was pure fire energy!” - Karan Aujla

The incident raises concerns over safety at large events and highlights the need for better security measures at concerts.

item.title: Malaika Arora recalls mom was called to her college over poor attendance: 'I started doing a few ads, shows' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Malaika Arora recalls mom was called to her college over poor attendance: 'I started doing a few ads, shows'

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Malaika Arora began her modelling career while in college, motivated by a desire for independence. However, her journey faced challenges, including poor attendance that led her college to contact her mother.

  • Malaika reflects on how her college attendance issues prompted her mother to receive calls from the institution.
  • She started modelling to contribute to her family as her mother was a single parent.
  • Malaika emphasizes her desire for independence rather than fame in her career pursuits.
  • Her parents separated when she was young, leading her to develop a close bond with her mother.
“I want to be independent. I needed to do something which gave me some sort of value.” - Malaika Arora

Malaika's story illustrates the challenges and motivations behind her early career choices and reflects on her supportive family dynamics.
